resources.string: SMSAlarm requires device admin control for the wipe/lock features.
Play a loud alarm when activation sms is sent.
Choose what text to send to activate the alarm. It is recommended to use a PIN in your activation SMS to avoid unauthorised activation of the alarm.
Whether to vibrate when alarm is activated.
How long the alarm should last.
Lock the device when activation sms is sent.
Choose what text to send to lock the device. It is recommended to use a PIN in your activation SMS to avoid unauthorised locking.

Choose what password will be used to lock the device. This is the default password that will be set, custom passwords can be provided when sending SMS by appending the requested password to the SMS. If set to blank, the password/lock method will not be changed but the device will get locked to force re-authentication using the existing password.
Wipe the device when activation sms is sent.
Choose what text to send to wipe the device. It is recommended to use a PIN in your activation SMS to avoid unauthorised wiping.
